There are seven main Chakras situated on the physical body, plus another seven that correspond with the sephiroth of the kabala and are situated off the physical body: 

#crown (keter) 
#brow 
#throat (da'at) 
#heart 
#solar (tiphareth) 
#hara or sacral
#base (yesod) 
#chokmah 
#binah 
#chesed 
#gedulah 
#netzah 
#hod 
#malkuth
